channel.title: Username Change
channel.description: Wow-wee, it's been ages since I came on these forums since I use another RSPS forums. I was wondering if I could change my username to another username on here so I can show people that I actually started RSPS in 2009, please?

item.title: Username Change
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:2, topic:462822”][quote author=Impious Lols link=topic=566043.msg4116854#msg4116854 date=1349145124]
Wow-wee, it’s been ages since I came on these forums since I use another RSPS forums. I was wondering if I could change my username to another username on here so I can show people that I actually started RSPS in 2009, please?
[/quote]
it shows your date of registration on your profile, plus in all honesty who cares when you started[/quote]A lot of people actually care.

EDIT: Also Impious Lols, pm Taharok about it and he’ll most likely do it for you.

Read full topic
